name.jp: ジャイアントモンスター召還のオーブ(A)

description.en: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.br: Pode invocar um dos Gigantes: Glaphan, Quimeradon, Bearnerky, Muffrin ou Popcrank em algum lugar próximo. Para usar, clique duas vezes no item e depois selecione uma área no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能够召唤出双足食人鱼、变种蝙蝠、独眼野熊、厨子麻普、魔盒小丑其中之一的晶球。
description.de: Ein Giant Glaphan, General Chimeradon, General Bearnerky, Great Chef Muffrin oder Queen Popcrank werden in deiner Nähe beschworen.
description.fi: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un des géants suivants : Glaphan, Kimeradon, Bearnerky, Muffrin ou Joker. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Akan memanggil Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin atau Popcrank di dekatnya. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.jp: グラファン、キメラドン、ハニーシーカー、マフリン・シェフ、ポップクランク の中でどれか1匹のジャイアントモンスターを召喚するオーブ。
description.kr: 글라팬, 키메라돈, 베어너키, 머푸린, 팝크랭크 중 한 종류의 거대 몬스터를 소환 하는 구슬
description.nl: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.sp: Invoca a uno de los siguientes Gigantes: Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin o Popcrank. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Will summon a Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin or Popcrank nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.th: จะเรียก Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin หรือ Popcrank ในบริเวณใกล้เคียง ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่บนพื้นเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能夠召喚出邪惡皮皮、蠻種蝙蝠王、獨眼野熊王、廚子麻普、詭異小丑其中之一的晶球。要使用，請點擊它兩下，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Sẽ triệu hồi một Giant Glaphan, Chimeradon, Bearnerky, Chef Muffrin hoặc Popcrank ở gần đó. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
